title: "Ken's Eggs"
output: html_document
---

Historical Egg Counts

```{r data, include=FALSE}

eggs <- c(8,8)

start <- "2016-09-23"

today <- "2016-09-24"

date <-seq(as.Date(start), as.Date(today), by="days")


df <- data.frame(eggs, date)

```

```{r plot, echo=FALSE}
library(plotly)

plot_ly(df, x = date, y = eggs)

```
